Jeremy Pena, who won a Gold Glove earlier this week, drove in Houston's first run before becoming the first rookie shortstop to hit a World Series home run

articles.description: Mo Salah and Darwin Nunez both poked home from close range to give Liverpool all three UEFA Champions League points against group-winners Napoli.Never miss a...

articles.author: Man City
articles.title: Club statement: Manchester City v Sevilla FC - Manchester City FC
articles.description: Manchester City strongly condemns the racist abuse that Rico Lewis was subject to from Sevilla supporters at yesterday’s match.
articles.content:
We understand that two arrests have been made and are continuing to work with Sevilla and GMP to investigate this matter. 
We will not tolerate discrimination of any kind at our stadium and will be … [+64 chars]
